TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit X509IssuerSerial extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 表示 XML 数字签名的 <> 元素。

span.span: Represents the <> element of an XML digital signature.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 结构表示` 元素的 XML 数字签名规范所定义的 XML 数字签名。The structure represents the ` element of an XML digital signature defined by the XML digital signature specification. ` 元素是子元素的 <`X509Data`> 元素，其中包含 X.509v3 证书颁发者的可分辨名称和序列号对。The ` element is the subelement of the <`X509Data`> element that contains an X.509v3 certificate issuer's distinguished name and serial number pair. 可分辨的名称和序列号对帮助确定特定的 X.509v3 证书。The distinguished name and serial number pair help identify a specific X.509v3 certificate. X.509 证书的颁发者是颁发证书的证书颁发机构的名称。The issuer of an X.509 certificate is the name of the certification authority that issued the certificate. 证书颁发机构分配它们发出唯一序列号以进行标识每个证书。Certification authorities assign each certificate they issue a unique serial number for identification purposes. 使用结构，以指定证书颁发者的可分辨名称和序列号对使用时类。Use the structure to specify a certificate issuer's distinguished name and serial number pair when using the class. 您可以添加结构类使用属性。You can add an structure to the class using the property. 或者，可以添加表示 X.509 证书颁发者的可分辨的名称和序列号对使用的字符串值方法。Alternatively, you can add string values that represent the X.509 certificate issuer's distinguished name and serial number pair using the method. 有关详细信息` 元素，请参阅在 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ World Wide Web 联合会 (W3C) 规范。For more information about the ` element, see the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) specification at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何进行签名并验证从证书存储中使用的 X.509 证书对 XML 文档。The following code example demonstrates how to sign and verify an XML document using an X.509 certificate from a certificate store. 此示例中将信息保存到已签名的文档使用对象。This example saves key information to the signed document using the object. [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.X509IssuerSerial#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.Xml.X509IssuerSerial/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.X509IssuerSerial#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.Xml.X509IssuerSerial/vb/sample.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 X.509 证书颁发者的可分辨名称。

span.span: Gets or sets an X.509 certificate issuer's distinguished name.

value.span: 一个 X.509 证书颁发者的识别名。

span.span: An X.509 certificate issuer's distinguished name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性表示中指定的 X.509 证书颁发者的可分辨的名称` 元素。The property represents an X.509 certificate issuer's distinguished name specified in the ` element. 有关详细信息` 元素，请参阅在 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ World Wide Web 联合会 (W3C) 规范。For more information about the ` element, see the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) specification at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何进行签名并验证从证书存储中使用的 X.509 证书对 XML 文档。The following code example demonstrates how to sign and verify an XML document using an X.509 certificate from a certificate store. 此示例中将信息保存到已签名的文档使用对象。This example saves key information to the signed document using the object.
